SMTG_TMPL_HDR_T.NAME: Template to inform task recipients
SMTG_TMPL_HDR_T.DESCRIPTION: Can be used to send notification mail to the recipients of the work item. The custom templates has to follow the pattern: <YY1>_<ScenarioId>_<CRT>_<ACTIVITY_NODEID> or <YY1>_<ScenarioId>_CRT_ALL

SMTG_TMPL_CONT.SUBJECT: Please {{TaskName}}
SMTG_TMPL_CONT.BODY_TXT: The task instance with the internal id '{{WorkflowTaskInternalID}}' and the name '{{TaskName}}' was created for you. Please check your inbox https://vhpptds4ci.sap.ps.com:44300/sap/bc/ui2/flp?sap-client=050&sap-language=EN#WorkflowTask-displayInbox?allItems=true&/empty_view
SMTG_TMPL_CONT.BODY_HTML:
Dear Approver,

Please check your SAP inbox, and Review & {{TaskName}} that was created. Kindly find below link for SAP Inbox.

https://vhpptds4ci.sap.ps.com:44300/sap/bc/ui2/flp?sap-client=110&sap-language=EN#WorkflowTask-displayInbox?

Have any questions or need any clarification, Please contact the Purchase Order creator.

Thanks,

Public Storage Procurement team.
